JobFullDesc: At Pitney Bowes, we do the right thing, the right way.  As a member of our team, you can too.We have amazing people who are the driving force, the inspiration and foundation of our company. Report any defective findings to the Transportation Supervisor to be fixed immediately.Maintains a daily driver’s log or route sheet for mileage, stops and cargo, or utilization of TMW of “Live” mail.Returns client damaged or undeliverable mail, following internal handling procedures for damaged secured mail.Uses all required cell phone applications.Keeps work area clean by ensuring mail bins are under machines or in APC’s, plastic straps are off floor to prevent possible tripping hazards, and sweeping the floors between assigned pickups or deliveries, and all other duties as
